EmailTemplate.name: Expense Approved - Email To Resource
EmailTemplate.subject: Expense is Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Expense__c.Resource__c},
Your Expense for {!Expense__c.Expense_Type__c} for the amount of {!Expense__c.00N5200000Krjal} {!Expense__c.Billing_Currency__c} has been approved by {!Expense__c.Approval_Manager__c}.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
